newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Saudi Pak to buy Standard Chartered M.L.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Pak to buy Standard Chartered M.L.

text.p: The Standard Chartered Group in Pakistan said on Thursday it will sell its present shareholdings in the Standard Chartered Mercantile Leasing Co. Ltd to Saudi Pak Industrial and Agricultural Investment Co Ltd.
"The formal completion of sale is conditional upon compliance with all legal and regulatory formalities," a joint statement of the two companies said.
The Standard said it wanted to focus on commercial banking.
Saudi Pak is a joint venture between the governments of Saudi Arabia and Pakistan whose chairman is nominated by the Saudi government.
